code: import{Card,CardHeader,CardBody,CardTitle,Button,CardText}from'reactstrap';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import withReactContent from'sweetalert2-react-content';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MySwal=withReactContent(Swal);var SweetAlertTypes=function SweetAlertTypes(){var handleSuccess=function handleSuccess(){return MySwal.fire({title:'Good job!',text:'You clicked the button!',icon:'success',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};var handleInfo=function handleInfo(){return MySwal.fire({title:'Info!',text:'You clicked the button!',icon:'info',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};var handleWarning=function handleWarning(){return MySwal.fire({title:'Warning!',text:' You clicked the button!',icon:'warning',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};var handleError=function handleError(){return MySwal.fire({title:'Error!',text:' You clicked the button!',icon:'error',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h4",children:"Types"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardText,{className:"mb-0",children:"SweetAlert comes with 4 built-in types which will show a corresponding icon animation: \"warning\", \"error\", \"success\" and \"info\"."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"demo-inline-spacing",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"success",onClick:handleSuccess,outline:true,children:"Success"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"danger",onClick:handleError,outline:true,children:"Error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"warning",onClick:handleWarning,outline:true,children:"Warning"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"info",onClick:handleInfo,outline:true,children:"Info"})]})]})]});};export default SweetAlertTypes;
